014package org.jdbi.v3.core.internal;
015
016import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
017import java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles;
018import java.lang.invoke.MethodType;
019import java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler;
020import java.lang.reflect.Method;
021import java.lang.reflect.Proxy;
022import java.util.Arrays;
023import java.util.Collections;
024import java.util.Comparator;
025import java.util.Map;
026import java.util.Map.Entry;
027import java.util.Objects;
028import java.util.Optional;
029import java.util.function.Function;
030import java.util.stream.Collectors;
031
032import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.exceptions.Unchecked;
033
034public class AnnotationFactory {
035    private AnnotationFactory() {}
036
037    public static <T extends Annotation> T create(Class<T> annotationType) {
038        return create(annotationType, Collections.emptyMap());
039    }
040    public static <T extends Annotation> T create(Class<T> annotationType, Map<String, ?> values) {
041        Arrays.stream(annotationType.getDeclaredMethods())
042            .filter(m -> m.getDefaultValue() == null)
043            .filter(m -> !values.containsKey(m.getName()))
044            .findAny()
045            .ifPresent(m -> {
046                throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format(
047                        "Cannot synthesize annotation @%s from %s.class because it has attribute '%s' without a default or specified value",
048                        annotationType.getSimpleName(),
049                        annotationType.getName(),
050                        m.getName()));
051        });
052
053        Class<?>[] interfaces = {annotationType};
054        InvocationHandler invocationHandler = getInvocationHandler(annotationType, values);
055
056        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
057        T annotation = (T) Proxy.newProxyInstance(
058                Optional.ofNullable(annotationType.getClassLoader())
059                        .orElseGet(Thread.currentThread()::getContextClassLoader),
060                interfaces,
061                invocationHandler);
062
063        return annotation;
064    }
065
066    private static <T extends Annotation> InvocationHandler getInvocationHandler(Class<T> annotationType, Map<String, ?> values) {
067        final Function<Method, Object> getValue = method ->
068            Optional.<Object>ofNullable(values.get(method.getName()))
069                .orElseGet(method::getDefaultValue);
070        final int hashCode = Arrays.stream(annotationType.getDeclaredMethods())
071                .mapToInt(m -> memberHash(m.getName(), getValue.apply(m)))
072                .sum();
073        final String toString = "@" + annotationType.getName() + "("
074                + values.entrySet()
075                    .stream()
076                    .sorted(Comparator.comparing(Entry::getKey))
077                    .map(e -> e.getKey() + "=" + e.getValue())
078                    .collect(Collectors.joining(", "))
079                + ")";
080        return (proxy, method, args) -> {
081            String name = method.getName();
082            if ("annotationType".equals(name) && method.getParameterCount() == 0) {
083                return annotationType;
084            }
085
086            if ("equals".equals(name) && method.getParameterCount() == 1
087                && Object.class.equals(method.getParameterTypes()[0])) {
088                Object arg = args[0];
089                if (!(arg instanceof Annotation)) {
090                    return false;
091                }
092                Annotation that = (Annotation) arg;
093                return annotationType.equals(that.annotationType()) && valuesEqual(annotationType, proxy, that);
094            }
095
096            if ("hashCode".equals(name) && method.getParameterCount() == 0) {
097                return hashCode;
098            }
099
100            if ("toString".equals(name) && method.getParameterCount() == 0) {
101                return toString;
102            }
103
104            if (method.getDeclaringClass() == annotationType) {
105                return getValue.apply(method);
106            }
107
108            throw new IllegalStateException("Unknown method " + method + " for annotation type " + annotationType);
109        };
110    }
111
112    private static int memberHash(String name, Object value) {
113        return (127 * name.hashCode()) ^ valueHash(value);
114    }
115
116    private static int valueHash(Object value) {
117        Class<? extends Object> valueClass = value.getClass();
118        if (!valueClass.isArray()) {
119            return value.hashCode();
120        }
121        return Unchecked.supplier(() ->
122            (Integer) MethodHandles.publicLookup()
123                .findStatic(Arrays.class, "hashCode", MethodType.methodType(int.class, valueClass))
124                .invoke(value)).get();
125    }
126
127    private static <A extends Annotation> boolean valuesEqual(Class<A> annotationType, Object a, Object b) {
128        for (Method m : annotationType.getDeclaredMethods()) {
129            Function<Object, Object> invoker = Unchecked.function(m::invoke);
130            Object valueA = invoker.apply(a);
131            Object valueB = invoker.apply(b);
132            if (valueA != null
133             && valueB != null
134             && valueA.getClass().isArray()
135             && valueA.getClass().equals(valueB.getClass())
136             && Boolean.FALSE.equals(Unchecked.supplier(() ->
137                    MethodHandles.publicLookup()
138                        .findStatic(Arrays.class, "equals", MethodType.methodType(boolean.class, valueA.getClass(), valueB.getClass()))
139                        .invoke(a, b)).get())) {
140                return false;
141            }
142            if (!Objects.equals(valueA, valueB)) {
143                return false;
144            }
145        }
146        return true;
147    }
148}
